From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To configure system-level validation on context switches on a scheduler, and check system level-timers, use the **scheduler timercheck system context** command in global configuration mode. To disable the configuration, use the **no** form of this command.

ParaDef.Info: This commmand has no arguments or keywords.

Examples: The following example shows how to configure system level validation on context switches on a scheduler:

RelatedCmds.description: Configures process-level timer validation on a scheduler.
